channel.title: [PI] What's the code
channel.description:
for if the person needs an item for them do be able to do the thing they want to do?
I know the code for giving the item to them, just I need the code for them to HAVE the item before they are able to do it.
Thanks

item.title: [PI] What's the code
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:2, topic:527833”]The name of the method depends on your source.
It will look something like this though:if (blah) { if (playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) { //Do //things //here. } else { sendMessage("You need blah item to do blah."); } }[/quote]

Thanks for this

Got it work. Raw code didn’t work so I had to edit it abit but I got it to work. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] What's the code
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

It’s called a conditional. You should check them sometime.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] What's the code
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

The name of the method depends on your source.
It will look something like this though:if (blah) { if (playerHasItem(itemID, amount)) { //Do //things //here. } else { sendMessage("You need blah item to do blah."); } }
